name: I took a trip
lyric:
I took a trip
I took a trip
I went to spain

I sang a song
I danced around
And played in the rain

I took a trip
I took a trip
I went to france
I read a book
I rode a bike
And learned to dance

I took a trip
I took a trip
I went to rome

I ate pizza
I wrote a friend
And then I went home
